post.body: omg lmao! TiVoing and can't wait! Meanwhile, go Dallas!$!$ LOL
Least u have the option. 1time I took jake to petsmart he tried to kill the girl with the dryer. We've been banned. Petco, may ...
Lunch...WITH DRINKS! Doubles, even.
then luke and I got old and retarded. Planning a NYE party though--a poker one. Interested?
True! And I think u even came at Halloween! Or maybe that was just Bird. Either way? We PARTIED at the holidays LOL
Ah Hem... Used to party like rock stars at the holidays-u and Heath came once. 'member that time?
But your Skinz can't!
But mailed u a card? How much sense does that make? Still in Roanoke? Wow wee
daaaaaamn
Gretchen or Shelby? LOL just guessing
for the love of god...our kids have the worst timing, don't they? Keep me posted. Love u all
Barfing?! RU subjecting my kids to BARF again 2morrow? OMG I'm sorry they're sick-I can't handle nymore barf
And? It's 70 degrees today. In VA! WTF lol
Just finished an enchilada in cheese sauce & chicken taco *burp* :)
Meeting Luke at Carlos O'Kellys--Will have margarita for you :) Now THATS a friend!
Finally started wrapping-in the basemt. Wish I was upstairs in my pretty fam rm with my pretty 10' tree. F'in flood! http://twitpic.com/szyu
Taking a Japanese steakhouse break. Shoppings exhausting! Capt & coke, plz!
Going to meet Luke for some Krimis shopping. Blah
minus two fans-next appt set for monday. not looking forward to an entire weeknd of this shit still sucking all the moisture out of my house
todays appt revealed kitchen ceramic still wet-needs replacing. fam rm dry-carpet pad needs replacing. basemt dry-floor joists still damp.
Here's one: lent friend our lawn mower over smr. He lost his job and SOLD it. Uhm, WTF?! Tym to collect!
also? dehumidifiers sucking ALL moisture out of my plants (all limpy) and my aromatic diffusers. they're all dried up! least it's working...
house smells better, though still a wreck. ryan sent home today with fifth's disease - rash on cheeks. sleeping now. never a dull moment...
MY HOUSE SMELLS LIKE SHIT
My house has 756275 fans & dehumidifiers on full blast til Fri at soonest. Sounds like jets flying through-no kitchen use either
Had to ask, didn't I? ADT just called me--fire alarm going off. Zooming bk home to be sure fans didn't e xplode!!
And? Now running gas to my friend stranded on the road--the dumbass LOL! What else?I shouldn't ask
My flood? Moldy smells like death carpets. ServPro on their way; homeowners policy claim filed. Merry effin Xmas!
Luke & inlaws home with boys while I go blonde again. Brunettes and red heads don't have more fun-I've tried :)
Laundry done, house clean, cookies baked. Inlaws coming thru wknd. Enjoying latte & cookies with mom :)
Fourth grade winter program tonight--Jay will be playing the "tangerine" LOL (tamborine)
House dry Fans gone Carpet replaced this pm Ceramic needs replacing Progress!
